title: The Spectacular Week of Bob Price, The Dancing Tutor

story.text: Bob Price discovered a glowing amulet while cleaning out the attic of his old family home. When he touched it, he felt a surge of energy.
The next morning, Bob realized he could move incredibly fast and had enhanced mental acuity. He decided to use these powers to help his students learn even quicker and to save time in his day.
While tutoring, Bob noticed a group of teens vandalizing a local park. Using his new abilities, he dashed over and stopped them, talking them into volunteering to clean the park instead.
Bob started using his powers at dance events to perform breathtaking routines that also subtly dissuaded negative behaviors among attendees.
His dual life was exhilarating, but taxing. Bob took the day to organize a huge tutoring session, helping dozens of students in what used to take weeks.
News of the 'Dancing Tutor' began to spread. Bob was invited to teach dance and study techniques at a national conference.
On his way home, Bob thwarted a robbery using a combination of his speedy thought process and swift dance moves, solidifying his status as a local hero.

ending: Despite the fatigue, Bob never felt more fulfilled, knowing each day he was making a difference.
moral: Using one's unique talents for good can transform not just your life, but the wider community.
